lead_paragraph: MANGANARO--Felicia, age 95, passed away July 15, peacefully. She was the devoted wife of 67 years to her late husband John and a proud, loving mother to Peter and Rosemary. Felicia lived for her family and devoted her life in taking care of us with God-given love and passion. Mother we shall miss you dearly. 1/3
